document.title: Alabama Extended Standards English Language Arts

FBE253E749084B4997044F9A3F05CADA.description:
Complete an entertaining activity
on a computer or tablet device.
Example: Listen to an online
story on a tablet device

AE1F0803AAC447B8B88E364E4D266AB7.description:
Use a computer or tablet device
to complete an educational
activity.
Examples: Play an educational
game on a computer; Use an
educational application on a
tablet device

E211204C151446008B6C0692F00F0F8A.description:
Use a computer to initiate and
complete a simple writing task.
Example: Open a word
processing program and type
words from a list to take home
and study for a spelling test

A705F7B268ED44A9B3C7D6DA8E584247.description:
Use a computer to initiate and
complete a simple writing task.
Example: Open a word
processing program and type
words from a list to take home
and study for a spelling test

FDA62F0576AC46BBB81727376486DBA6.description:
Use a computer to complete
a simple writing task.
Example: Type words from
a list to take home and
study for a spelling test

729225FE5FC84E319912C486042ECC2E.description: Participate in carrying out a task.

7D485D30B3FA4B2CB81BB07E704A7124.description:
Identify the logical first step
needed to carry out a task.

77141AD09F564391AAFD36E6DD972CB6.description:
Select words, phrases or pictures
to indicate the steps needed to
carry out a task.
Example: Identify the steps for
making a peanut butter and jelly
sandwich from choices provided

D05D5ECC3E734CC68C5716A89F06144F.description:
Dictate or write steps needed to
carry out a task.
Example: Dictate the steps for
wiping of the table

5703ADD34F0B42BF9A48429363927D87.description:
Select words, phrases or
pictures to indicate the
steps needed to carry out a
task.
Example: Identify the steps
for making a peanut butter
and jelly sandwich from
choices provided

2A29177628EF4C46A4BAEA86FC27D6AA.description:
Recognize first name in print or
tactile representation for name.
Example: Eye gaze or touch
name when shown two names

F18AA0B5164B42EA824FD00C3967934F.description: Copy or trace first and last name

AFAF199BE4984DF4B248FBB2251C2F97.description:
Print or type first and last name in
upper- or lower-case letters.
Example: Print or type SALLY
BROWN, sally brown, or Sally
Brown

98BF13A139DC48F0B531B6AA591E19AF.description:
Write first name, last name, or
both first and last name in
cursive.

E9F935A607D14E6F9F46383996FF5E41.description:
Print or type first and last
name in upper- or lowercase
letters.
Example: Print or type
SALLY BROWN, sally
brown, or Sally Brown
